mapper.select: select b.member_number, b.buy_date , b.buy_number , sf.store_file_system_name , s.store_number, s.store_title , s.store_price, b.buy_cnt , b.buy_status , b.buy_post , b.buy_post_code , m.member_name , m.member_phone_number , m.member_email , m.member_address , m.member_address_detail , m.member_zone_code, b.buy_msg, b.buy_name, m.member_id from tbl_buy b join tbl_store s on b.member_number = #{memberNumber} and b.store_number = s.store_number left outer join tbl_store_file sf on s.store_number = sf.store_number join tbl_member m on m.member_number = b.member_number order by buy_date desc limit #{startRow}, #{rowCount}
